channel.title: [READ MORE]Moparscape Server Status Page Messed Up[READ MORE]
channel.description:
The mopar server status page is messed up, or hacked. all the servers were deleted, and now you cant post anymore, the "mod" denies it every time...ive tried 38 times now and they have denied it every time... this is all i was posting in the server description(Note i put **** where the ip/forum was, so im not accused of advertising) Description:
Join Now Use MoparScape Client! Forums: ****.**********.*** IP: **********.**-**.*** Owner: Dibiase DON'T ASK FOR STAFF! Pictures: PICTURE OF SERVER(1) PICTURE OF SERVER(2) PICTURE OF SERVER(3) PICTURE OF SERVER(4) PICTURE OF SERVER(5) PICTURE OF SERVER(6) PICTURE OF SERVER(7) PICTURE OF SERVER(8) PICTURE OF SERVER(9) PICTURE OF SERVER(10)
there is nothing wrong about that advertisement for the status page, why does it keep getting denied?

item.title: [READ MORE]Moparscape Server Status Page Messed Up[READ MORE]
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

We have nothing to do with moparscape here. This isn’t the place.

I think you should pm moparisthebest.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

The mopar server status page is messed up, or hacked. all the servers were deleted, and now you cant post anymore, the “mod” denies it every time…ive tried 38 times now and they have denied it every time…

this is all i was posting in the server description(Note i put **** where the ip/forum was, so im not accused of advertising)

Description:

Join Now Use MoparScape Client!

Forums: .***.
IP: *******.-.

Owner: Dibiase

DON’T ASK FOR STAFF!
